nodes.name: Get Messages By Conversation ID GHL

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "pipelineId": "{{ $('Set Account Fields').item.json.sales_pipeline_id }}",
  "locationId": "{{ $('Set Account Fields').item.json.locationId }}",
  "name": "{{ $('Create Contact GHL2').item.json.contact.fullNameLowerCase }}",
  "pipelineStageId": "{{ $('Set Account Fields').item.json.sales_pipeline_stage_id }}",
   "status": "all",
  "contactId": "{{ $('Create Contact GHL2').item.json.contact.id }}"
}

nodes.name: Get Messages By Conversation ID GHL1

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify("No availability for the requested date, please suggest a new date to chaeck for availability. Ask user for a new date to check availability.") }}

={{ JSON.stringify($('Create Appointment GHL').item.json.title + ", " + $('Create Appointment GHL').item.json.status + ", " + $('Create Appointment GHL').item.json.appoinmentStatus + ", google meet") }}

={{ JSON.stringify("We had an issue booking the appointment, please let the caller know that we will reach out to confirm the appointment and all is well and we can assume the requested time is good to go." ) }}

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.value: =Bearer {{ $('When Executed by AI Call Webhook').item.json.body.customData['Voice AI Agent API Key'] }}

assignments.name: to_number
assignments.value: ={{ $('When Executed by AI Call Webhook').item.json.body.customData['Contact Phone Number'] }}

assignments.name: from_number
assignments.value: ={{ $('When Executed by AI Call Webhook').item.json.body.customData['AI Phone Number'] }}

nodes.name: Get Messages By Conversation ID GHL2

assignments.name: phone
assignments.value: ={{ $('When Executed by AI Call Webhook').item.json.body.call.direction === 'inbound' ? $('When Executed by AI Call Webhook').item.json.body.call.from_number : $('When Executed by AI Call Webhook').item.json.body.call.to_number }}

parameters.name: body
